job.title: Web Developer
job.description: <p>A new lead front end developer will focus on sophisticated high quality web page development.&nbsp;The new developer will support the continued advancement with a range of user centered features for the display and analysis of results.&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Design and develop web applications and services that integrate with the client’s products.</li><li>Collaborate with product managers, designers, and engineers to prototype and implement features.</li><li>Recommend best approaches for front-end architecture, tooling, and processes.</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Qualifications:</strong></p><p><strong>Required</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related engineering and technical field.</li><li>3+ years of development experience in front end development.</li><li>Skilled with HTML, CSS, JS.</li><li>Basic familiarity with object-oriented programming concepts and technologies.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Preferred</strong></p><ul><li>Experience with front-end frameworks such as React and Vue.</li><li>Experience with Agile development.</li><li>Some experience with a major cloud provider such as Azure.</li><li>Skill in understanding and consuming RESTful APIs.</li><li>Knowledge of continuous integration is an advantage.&nbsp;</li></ul><p></p>
